column5: Hello everyone good morning, just wondering if anyone will be out at the toronto islands for the pike opener on sat may 5th. Which of the islands do you think would be the best shot for my first pike?
At this time of year all are good.  Follow the same path you took last time.
Thanks snog i might be up there alone so maybe i should stick to where i know.
Just watch out for the lose pitbull on the islandl!!   dsn

I was down there on Sunday.  I was "fishing", but not for anything with fins  Lots of people out, and no pitbull.  I did make the call to the SPCA back in March.  I guess either they caught it, or a resident from the east side nabbed their pet.  On opening day, where ever there is water is a good bet!  Pick a ferry, and start walking and casting.  Like Snog said, you might do better to stick to areas that you are familiar with.
Thanks guys for the input happy fishing.

I've been wondering about this for a while:  Are the Islands zone 4 or 8 (05-06 Regs p. 11)?  They are in the lake, so does that mean they are zone 8?  What about when you are fishing from shore along Lake Ontario, is that zone 4 or 8?
From what i am told it is in zone 8 . Pike opens first saturday in may.
